name: @cdo/code-studio
description: Pipeline for static assets used by our Code Studio rails app (i.e. dashboard)
author: Code.org

scripts.lint: npm run lint-js -s && npm run lint-css -s
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build:min: npm run build-js:min && npm run build-css:min
scripts.build-css:min: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules --include-path src/css src/css/blockly_editor.css.scss build/css/blockly_editor.min.css
